snippet.title: Olympia Rising - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming soon to PC, Mac, and Linux. Available via the Humble Store and Steam!

Olympia Rising is a 2-D action platformer where players take the role of Iola - a young warrior who has been cast into the Underworld after falling in battle. She must navigate through the various twisted regions of Hades' domain, fighting through hoards of deadly creatures as she attempts her escape and makes her way to Mount Olympus. Lush pixel graphics and fluid animation bring this stylized world to life as you jump, climb, slash, and incinerate your way through each stage.

FEATURES:

-Fight your way through the Underworld, battling creatures of all shapes and sizes. Fast-paced aerial combat propels you upward as you slash enemies to bits with your blade or use spells to smite them to the ground.

-Navigate through deadly environments with fluid maneuverability. Explore 6 unique worlds, and decide your own path as you traverse through each stage looking for the most efficient way to climb to the top.

-Fierce boss encounters await Iola at the end of each Underworldy region - from gargantuan crabs to bone-crunching cyclops'

-Chain enemy kill as you jump through the air - build up a big combo to earn even more coins to pay Charon the Ferryman and pass through the many gates of the Underworld

-Challenging gameplay that's simple to pick-up, but difficult to master.
